description: A moon giant whose ancestors were brought to Earthdash to mine Ultimite in the Underground due to the fact that it was poisonous to humans but not them he wears a suit that is as big as a big foot possibly to also provide him protection from the ultimite due to his weaked resistance to its poisonous effects and he protected his friends` graves until Dan found him and introduced him to the world of basquash and told him that his friends` would not want him to spend the rest of his life protecting their graves.
name: Naviga Stelte
